roleset.name: take shelter
roleset.note: HOLE_UP-V NOTES: Frames file for 'hole up' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from hole.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: active
example.text: When the weather cools, Mr. Baker says, hobos often hole up in abandoned houses.

example.name: pseudopassive
example.text: Some of our sources in Thailand say [the notorious old Khmer Rouge leader, Pol Pot,]-1 has been holed *trace*-1 up this summer in Khmer Rouge camps near the Thai-Cambodian border.
example.arg: in Khmer Rouge camps near the Thai-Cambodian border
